original: intro H. pose (fix f (i:nat) (Hi: i < n) : {y: nat | R i y} := match i with | O => match (H i Hi) with | ex_intro _ y H' => exist (fun y => R i y) y H' end | S p => match (H i Hi) with | ex_intro _ y H' => exist (fun y => R i y) y H' end end). exists (fun i => proj1_sig (f i (Nat.lt_trans _ _ _ (Nat.lt_succ_diag_r i) (le_lt_trans _ _ _ (le_n _) (Nat.lt_succ_diag_r n))))). intros i Hi. apply (proj2_sig (f i Hi)).
